tuv.seg: Tackling disadvantage in primary schools
Ag dul i ngleic le míbhuntáiste i mbunscoileanna
The Department of Education and Skills has several schemes aimed at tackling educational disadvantage in primary schools
Tá roinnt scéimeanna ag an Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna a bhfuil sé mar aidhm acu dhul i ngleic le míbhuntáiste oideachais i mbun scoileanna
Some of these come within the framework of the Department’s initiative 'Delivering Equality of Opportunity in Schools' (DEIS)
Tagann cuid acu seo laistigh de chreatlach thionscnamh na Roinne, sé sin 'Comhionannas Deiseanna sna Scoileanna a Sheachadadh (DEIS)'
This initiative brings together a range of national programmes to address educational disadvantage throughout the school system
Tugann an tionscnamh seo le chéile réimse de chláracha náisiúnta chun dhul i ngleic le míbhuntáiste oideachais tríd an gcóras scolaíochta go léir
The School Completion Programme (SCP), introduced in 2002, focuses on young people between the ages of 4 and 18 years of age
Díríonn an Clár Críochnaithe Scoile (SCP), a tugadh isteach in 2002, ar dhaoine óga idir 4 agus 18 mbliana d’aois
The programme is a support strand within the Child and Family Agency under the Department of Children and Youth Affairs
Snáithe thacaíochta atá sa chlár laistigh den An Ghníomhaireacht um Leanaí agus an Teaghlach faoin Roinn Leanaí agus Gnóthaí Óige

It forms part of the Department of Education and Skills social inclusion strategy Delivering Equality of Opportunity in Schools (DEIS) to help children and young people who are at risk of or who are experiencing educational disadvantage

Cruthaíonn sé cuid de straitéis cuimsithe shóisialta na Roinne Oideachais agus Scileanna, Comhionannas Deiseanna i Scoileanna a Sheachadadh (DEIS) chun cabhrú le leanaí atá i mbaol nó atá faoi mhíbhuntáiste oideachais

School Completion Programme aims to keep young people in the formal education system to completion of senior cycle or equivalent and to generally improve the quality of participation and educational attainment

Tá sé de chuspóir ag an gClár Críochnaithe Scoile daoine óga a choimeád sa chóras foirmiúil oideachais go dtí go gcríochnaíonn siad an córas sinsearach nó a chomhionann agus chun feabhas ginearálta a chur ar cháilíocht na rannpháirtíochta agus na gnóthachtála oideachais

Each project is managed by a local management committee and provides a tailored programme of in-school, after school and holiday time interventions to targeted children and young people who are at risk of early school leaving

Déanann coiste bainistíochta áitiúil gach tionscadal a bhainistiú agus cuireann siad clár saincheaptha idirghabhála le linn am scoile, i ndiaidh am scoile agus le linn am saoire ar fáil do leanaí agus d’ógánaigh sprioctha atá i mbaol an scoil a fhágáil go luath
The programme provides flexibility for schools to develop more effective strategies, like out-of-school support and outreach, family support, mentoring, staff development and parental involvement

Cuireann an clár solúbthacht ar fáil do scoileanna chun straitéisí níos éifeachtaí a fhorbairt, ar nós tacaíochta agus for-rochtana lasmuigh den scoil, tacaíocht teaghlaigh, meantóireacht, forbairt foirne agus baint na dtuismitheoirí
The School Meals Programme is a separate programme funded by the Department of Social Protection and local authorities
Is clár éagsúil é Clár na mBéilí Scoile maoinithe ag an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí agus údaráis áitiúil

It aims to supplement the diets of school-going children from disadvantaged backgrounds to help them fulfil their potential within the educational system and to reduce the risk of early school leaving

Tá sé mar aidhm aige seo cur le aiste bia pháistí scoile ó chúlra míbhuntáiste chun cabhrú leo bheith chomh maith agus is féidir leo laistigh den gcóras oideachais agus an baol go bhfágfaidís an scoil luath a mhaolú
There are two schemes
Tá dhá scéim ann
The Urban Scheme supports school meals for primary schools in urban areas
An Scéim Uirbeach a thacaíonn le béilí scoile do bhunscoileanna i gceantracha uirbeacha
This programme consists of daily sandwiches or buns and milk
Bainne, ceapairí nó borróga atá sa chlár seo
The scheme is not a replacement for home meals
Ní thógann sé áit béilí te an bhaile

The Local Projects Scheme gives funding directly to national and secondary schools, local groups and voluntary organisations, which operate their own school meals projects (the meals may be hot or cold)

Tugann An Scéim Tionscnaimh Áitiúla maoiniú díreach do na scoileanna náisiúnta agus dara leibhéil, grúpaí áitiúla agus eagraíochtaí deonacha, a oibríonn a gcuid béilí scoile féin (d'fhéadfadh na béilí a bheith fuar nó te)
In 2004 the scheme was extended to nursery schools catering for disadvantaged pre-school children
I 2004 méadaíodh an scéim chuig scoileanna naíonáin chun aire a thabhairt do pháistí réamhscolaíochta
These meals must be targeted at areas of disadvantage or at children with special needs
Caithfear na béilí seo a thabhairt do cheantair faoi mhíbhuntáiste nó do ghasúir le riachtanais speisialta
Funding is allocated on the basis of a rate per meal per child
Tá maoiniú ar fáil ar rátaí béile do gach páiste
The School Milk Scheme entitles schoolgoing children to a quarter litre of milk on each school day
Tugann an Scéim Bainne Scoile ceathrú lítear de bhainne do gach gasúr ar scoil gach lá
Pre-schools, primary and second-level schools are eligible for the Scheme, which is funded by the EU and the Irish Government
Tá réamh-scoileanna, bunscoileanna agus scoileanna dara leibhéil i dteideal na scéime atá maoinithe ag an AE agus ag an Rialtas
Crèches and other childminding concerns which are operated for commercial gain are not eligible under the rules of the School Milk Scheme
Níl creiseanna ná áiteanna eile cúram leanaí atá ag oibriú ar bhun tráchtála i dteideal de réir rialacha na scéime
For further information on DEIS contact the Social Inclusion Unit of the Department of Education and Skills
Chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil ar DEIS déan teagmháil leis an Aonad Cuimsiú Sóisialta sa Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna
For further information on the Schools Meals Scheme contact the local authority or the Department of Social Protection
Chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil faoin Scéim Béilí Scoile déan teagmháil leis an údarás áitiúil nó an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí
You can get an application form for the School Meals Local Projects Scheme (pdf)
Íoslódáil an fhoirm iarratais don Scéim Béilí Scoile (pdf)
You can also get the Good Practice Guide for School Food Initiatives
Is féidir leat Treoir Dheá-Chleachtais do Thionscnaimh na mBéilí Scoile a íoslódáil
